quest.name: Stranded
journal: The Confederate turns to you with a puzzled glimmer in his eye.
objectives: Observe the target from the vantage point.
Report what you saw to the perplexed Confederate.

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: You there. Have you got a minute?

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: I think I saw a girl collapsed on the beach, but I need to be sure. When you are up here for hours at a time, your eyes begin playing tricks on you. Here─take this telescope. Point it in that direction and tell me if you see her, too.

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: Take a look at the coast over there with the telescope. Do you see an unconscious girl?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search your surroundings for the unconscious girl. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the humanoid figure on the beach and inspect them with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With your telescope you spy a sapphire-haired girl. She appears to be unconscious.

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: So it is not just me, then?

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: Do you think you could do me another favor and check up on her?

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: I am afraid I cannot go there myself in case she is...well, you know...d-dead. Bah! Even just thinking about it gives me the shivers!

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: Please, can you go and see if she is all right? I shall remain here, lest you end up having to take care of two unconscious people on the beach.

dialogue.name: AOGAMI
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you, madamsir. You saved my life. I was gathering food from the sea when suddenly I was attacked by shore jellyfish. Their stings left me paralyzed, and I was washed ashore by the currents.

dialogue.name: AOGAMI
dialogue.text: Where I am from we are taught growing up to avoid contact with strangers. We would never go out of our way to rescue them. If it were not for your remarkable compassion, I would have no doubt died upon these shores, far away from home.

dialogue.name: AOGAMI
dialogue.text: As much as I would like to offer you a reward for what you have done for me, I sadly have nothing of value on me. If our paths should ever cross again, however, I shall be sure to give you something.

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: I was watching the two of you from afar with my telescope. Kami be praised! It seems the girl was still alive. Did she tell you what happened to her?

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: Indeed? The waters carry a myriad of strange things our way, including people. Though, most of them are already d-dead by the time they reach us. That is why I am up here and not down there doing patrols.

dialogue.name: MAN02682
dialogue.text: Had you not come when you did, I may have been forced to go down and deal with her myself. By the time I worked up the courage to do so, she might have been long gone. Please take this pouch of koban. You have saved not one, but two people today.
